ProductShortDescription: The rimless Smith Trailblazer ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses give you unobstructed views of the surf, sand and sea. Advanced lenses offer clarity, contrast and a vivid color experience.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• ChromaPop lenses use a proprietary technology to optimize color and increase clarity and definition, enabling you to see the outside world with exceptional vibrance 
• Polarized Trivex® lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain 
• Dark Brown frame color features brown tinted lenses, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight 
• The Smith Trailblazer ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses feature a hydrophilic Megol nosepiece and temple ends that get tacky when wet for grip during exercise and hot weather 
• 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan® Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants

ProductShortDescription: This weatherproof recharger kit comes with a solar panel to power up your portable electronic devices using the sun's energy or any USB port. Its light, compact design is perfect for all your travels.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Smaller and more powerful than comparable panels, the rugged, weather-resistant Nomad 7 solar panel folds down for easy transport
  • 7,800mAh recharger powers phones, tablets, cameras and more; works with Apple®, Android™ and Windows devices
  • Optimized to charge quickly from the included Nomad 7 solar panel or any USB port
  • Weatherproof design lets you spray it down, take it to the beach and leave it in the rain
  • Built-In, tangle-free microUSB cable for charging for phone and tablets; certified cables for efficient charging
  • 2 high-speed 2.4A USB ports are capable of dishing out fast charges at the same time; power 2 devices at once or share with a buddy

Imported.

ProductName: Goal Zero Nomad 14 Plus Solar Panel
ProductShortDescription: Breathe new life into your electronic devices when you're off the grid with the lightweight Goal Zero Nomad 14 Plus solar panel. It features a kickstand and power-flow indicator for optimal charging.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Smart charging features a dynamic auto-restart and intelligent electronics that optimize output, even in cloudy conditions
  • Easy-to-read LED indicator displays strength of solar conditions, offering immediate feedback on panel-to-sun placement to improve your solar charging experience
  • Auto restart identifies a fully charged device vs. one that's disconnected due to lack of sunlight; when the latter is detected, it automatically reconnects the device
  • Chainable design lets you connect up to 4 panels to collect more solar power and charge devices faster
  • Rugged, waterproof design includes a removable kickstand for perfect angle placement toward the sun
  • Charges most USB and 12V devices (not tablets) including smartphones, cameras, GPS and headlamps
  • Also charges Goal Zero Switch 10, Flip 10/20/30, Venture 30 and Sherpa 50 (all sold separately)

Imported.

ProductName: Goal Zero Yeti 150 Portable Power Generator
ProductShortDescription: A plug-and-play, gas-free mini powerhouse, the Goal Zero Yeti 150 Portable Power Generator cranks out portable power to keep your lights, phones and laptops juiced up when the power is down.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Plug into a solar panel and place in the sun; takes roughly 26- 52 hrs. to charge with the Nomad 13 solar panel; 11 - 22 hrs. to charge with the Boulder 30 (sold separately)
  • Two other ways to charge Yeti 150: from the wall (takes about 6 hrs.) or from your car using 12V port (takes about 8 hrs.)
  • Common devices that Yeti 150 powers include laptops, tablets, lights, C-PAP machines, smartphones, cameras, e-readers, MP3 players and personal gaming devices
  • Portable wall outlet powers laptops, lights and smartphones anywhere
  • Easy to carry with the convenient pop-up handle
  • Lead acid battery features 168 watt-hours (12V, 14Ah) capacity, hundreds of cycles, 3-month shelf life, no fuses and built-in charging/low-battery protection
  • Generator operates in temperatures ranging from 32° to 104° F (0° to 40° C)
  • The Goal Zero Yeti 150 solar power generator offers the following approximate power: 12V light (50 hrs.); smartphone (15 recharges); tablet (6 recharges); laptop (2 recharges)

Imported.

ProductName: Goal Zero Yeti 1400 Lithium Portable Power Station
ProductShortDescription: Offering easy-to-move power for basecamp, road trips and festival campgrounds, the Goal Zero Yeti Lithium 1400 portable power station keeps all kinds of devices charged up when you're on the go.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Yeti 1400 features built-in surge allowances and multistage protection for compatibility with a wide range of electronics
  • 1,425-Wh battery capacity with 132h and 10.8V easily powers devices ranging from lights to laptops and mini refrigerators to power tools
  • 4 USB outputs, 2 AC outputs and an Anderson Powerpole® connector let you plug in multiple devices at the same time
  • Power station recharges from the sun with a Goal Zero solar panel (sold separately) or from a wall outlet
  • Fully charged, the Yeti 1400 offers the following approximate power: headlamp (230+ charges); smartphone (70+ charges); laptop (23+ charges); tablet (52+ charges)

Imported.

ProductShortDescription: The all-purpose MTI Reflex PFD features a clean design, a comfortable fit, and excellent floatation at a great value.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Reliable comfort for canoeing, kayaking, paddleboarding rafting and other recreational watersports 
• Adjustable shoulder straps offer a versatile fit; either tighten up the shoulder area for a snug fit or loosen for more chest room 
• Shoulder adjustments are covered to add protection and provide a smooth, finished look to the vest 
• 2 open mesh zippered cargo pockets securely store essentials and drain water quickly 
• Dual strap adjustments create a snug fit on each side; adjustable waist strap has a quick-release buckle 
• Made of a durable, 300-denier polyester shell for long-lasting service 
• Imported

ProductShortDescription: The PFDiva by MTI takes your paddling comfort to the next level with women-specific padding.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Memory foam pads inside front of the vest personalize fit and add support 
• By filling the space under the bust, the memory foam evens out the contact between the body and the jacket, resulting in a remarkable difference in fit 
• 2 cargo pockets, 4-way lash tab and a single mesh pocket provide plenty of room for storing essentials 
• Short torso cut and racerback allows maximum mobility, minimal ride-up and great fit 
• Adjustable shoulder, waist and Z-adjust side straps make fine-tuning your fit quick and easy 
• Reflective tape accents on front, back and shoulders of the MTI PFDiva enhance visibility in low light

ProductShortDescription: The PFDiva by MTI takes your paddling comfort to the next level with women-specific padding.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Memory foam pads inside front of the vest personalize fit and add support 
• By filling the space under the bust, the memory foam evens out the contact between the body and the jacket, resulting in a remarkable difference in fit

  • Main zipper wraps around footbox allowing bag to be opened flat

  • Compression stuff sack included

ProductShortDescription: The lofty 800-fill-power Sierra Designs Backcountry Bed 800 2-Season Sleeping Bag has an integrated comforter and zero zippers for a unique outdoor sleeping experience through spring and summer.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Climb into the bag via the large oval opening on top; the oversize comforter seals up the opening so you can sleep comfortably no matter your position: back, side or stomach 
  • With a European Norm (EN) lower-limit rating of 29°F, the Backcountry Bed 800 2 -Season sleeping bag is suitable for spring and summer backpacking 
  • On warmer nights, flip the comforter outside the sleeping bag and tuck it back for ventilation; insulated hand/arm pockets provide warmth when the comforter is outside the bag 
  • Down is considered the best insulation available but when wet, it quickly loses loft and the ability to keep you warm; 800-fill-power DriDown is treated to resist moisture 
  • Proprietary process treats each individual duck down plume with a molecular-level polymer so the down stays dry longer, lofts better and dries faster than untreated down 
  • DriDown insulation stays dry 10 times longer, retains 170% more loft when exposed to moisture and dries 33% faster than untreated down 
  • Ripstop polyester exterior endures frequent use in the outdoors; polyester taffeta lining is soft and comfortable next to skin 
  • Sleeping pad sleeve on the bottom of the bag secures your pad (pad sold separately) to create the experience of a fully integrated bed 
  • Innovative zipperless foot vent self seals closed and can be operated from the inside using only your feet 
  • Comes with a stuff sack and storage sack 
  • European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bag
SEOMetaTagDescription: Climb into the bag via the large oval opening on top; the oversize comforter seals up the opening so you can sleep comfortably no matter your position: back, side or stomach With a European Norm (EN) lower-limit rating of 29°F, the Backcountry Bed 800 2 -Season sleeping bag is suitable for spring and summer backpacking On warmer nights, flip the comforter outside the sleeping bag and tuck it back for ventilation; insulated hand/arm pockets provide warmth when the comforter is outside the bag Down is considered the best insulation available but when wet, it quickly loses loft and the ability to keep you warm; 800-fill-power DriDown is treated to resist moisture Proprietary process treats each individual duck down plume with a molecular-level polymer so the down stays dry longer, lofts better and dries faster than untreated down DriDown insulation stays dry 10 times longer, retains 170% more loft when exposed to moisture and dries 33% faster than untreated down Ripstop polyester exterior endures frequent use in the outdoors; polyester taffeta lining is soft and comfortable next to skin Sleeping pad sleeve on the bottom of the bag secures your pad (pad sold separately) to create the experience of a fully integrated bed Innovative zipperless foot vent self seals closed and can be operated from the inside using only your feet Comes with a stuff sack and storage sack European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bag

ProductShortDescription: With a roomy contour fit, the 3-season Big Agnes Lost Ranger Sleeping Bag is insulated with water-resistant down that maintains loft and warmth, even if your outing turns damp
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Contour fit allows down insulation to drape comfortably and offers more range of motion inside the bag 
  • Insotect Flow construction uses internal gates to keep down from shifting 
  • 650-fill-power DownTek down insulation repels water and maintains loft, even when exposed to moisture 
  • Ripstop nylon shell with a durable water repellent finish sheds water; soft, breathable nylon lining 
  • Ergonomic hood design fits comfortably around face 
  • Draft tube behind zipper and down-filled draft collar prevent warm air from escaping and cold air from entering 
  • Underside insulation has been eliminated and replaced with a sleeve that fits a rectangular sleeping pad (pad not included) 
  • Long and regular bags are compatible with 20 in. wide pads; long/wide bag is compatible with 25 in. wide pads 
  • Continuous draft wedge insulates the connection between the bag and pad to prevent cold air from entering 
  • Liner loops keep sleeping bag liner (not included) from shifting and twisting 
  • Exterior loops for hang-drying or storage 
  • Mesh storage sack and nylon stuff sack included

• Climashield® HL synthetic fibers provide insulation that doesn't wear out

Its loft pocket profile rids excess fabrics without sacrificing comfort for lightweight convenience. Klymit integrated a pillow and still kept the weight lighter than most sleeping pads, and the included air pump, stuff sack, and patch kit add convenience to all your camping trips.

• Loft pocket profile 
  • 5-7 breath-inflatable 
  • Integrated head cradle pillow 
  • Dry air pump, stuff sack, and patch kit included

For the alpinist, thru-hiker or backcountry minimalist who's counting every ounce, there's no better choice to assure the kind of rest you need before a big day in the mountains.

• Patent-pending reflective layer returns heat back to your body and creates air pockets that conserve warmth, all without the bulk and weight of down and synthetic fills
  • New softer fabrics bring better next-to-skin comfort and boost durability with no added weight
  • Ultra-packable design offers less weight and bulk than a 1-liter water bottle
  • Advanced fabrics and a tapered design have an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio

ProductShortDescription: Mega in size, comfort and warmth, the Exped MegaMat 10 sleeping pad provides a cushy night's sleep on a self-inflating mat with a level surface from edge to edge.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Laminated polyester surface fabric is durable, airtight and humidity-resistant; nonslip finish keeps you on the pad
  • High-grade open-cell polyurethane foam offers efficient insulation; horizontal air channels cored through foam reduce mat weight
  • Features 2 wide, low-profile FlatValves for inflation and deflation; pad self-inflates, but to top off, inflate with the included minipump
  • Intake valve has a built-in flap to prevent air escaping when inflating; release flap to let a little air out when finding your ideal comfort zone
SEOMetaTagDescription: Mega in size, comfort and warmth, the Exped MegaMat 10 sleeping pad provides a cushy night's sleep on a self-inflating mat with a level surface from edge to edge.

• Upgrade any sleeping pad with the Big Agnes Saddleback Bedroll sleeping pad cover. Made from a non-woven heat reflective material and an air mesh top for breathability the Saddleback Bedroll adds comfort to your current pad.

ProductShortDescription: The NEMO Cosmo™ Air Lite Sleeping Pad blends featherlight fabric with a built-in foot pump for easy inflation and 3 in. of plush comfort for restful nights on summertime backpacking trips.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Pad features 3 in. baffled air chambers that evenly distribute weight; horizontal baffles create a flat sleeping surface and eliminate any bouncy feel
  • Give your lungs a break and use the built-in foot pump at the end of the pad to inflate the pad quickly and easily
  • Pillow baffle at the head end is oversize to provide extra loft under your head and prevents your camp pillow from sliding off the end of the pad
  • Featherlight 20-denier polyester fabric is airtight and engineered to hold strong welds while shaving serious weight
SEOMetaTagDescription: The NEMO Cosmo™ Air Lite Sleeping Pad blends featherlight fabric with a built-in foot pump for easy inflation and 3 in. of plush comfort for restful nights on summertime backpacking trips.

ProductName: Platypus GravityWorks Water Filter System - 4 Liter
ProductShortDescription: Keep a supply of drinking water right in your campsite. The Platypus GravityWorks™ water filter delivers 4 liters of potable water in just 2.5 minutes without requiring a single pump stroke.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• GravityWorks filter combines the speed and utility of the original Platypus CleanStream™ gravity filter with less weight and improved durability
  • System includes two 4-liter reservoirs, 1 for unfiltered water and 1 for clean water; reservoirs have hang loops for easy in-camp use
  • To use, simply fill the unfiltered-water reservoir with water and hang it above the clean-water reservoir to let gravity carry water through the filter
  • Hollow-fiber filter technology offers a high flow rate of 1.75 liters per minute—that's 4 liters in 2.5 minutes!
  • Filter physically removes particles, protozoa and bacteria down to 0.2 microns in size, including giardia, salmonella, cryptosporidia and more
  • Unfiltered-water reservoir features a quick-disconnect valve that automatically shuts off the flow of water when the hose is disconnected
  • Shutoff hose clamp on the clean water hose allows on-demand water control for filling bottles; clamp also shuts off the system when not in use
  • Clean the system by simply holding the clean reservoir above the unfiltered reservoir to backflush the filter
  • Reservoirs feature SlimeGuard™ antimicrobial treatment for taste-free performance
  • Platypus GravityWorks™ water filter system is compatible with Platypus Bottles, Water Tanks™ and Big Zip SL™ reservoirs, all sold separately

Made in USA.

ProductShortDescription: The Suunto Traverse is a GPS and Glonass watch designed for hikers and trekkers who want to explore new terrain and value simplicity.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Up to 100 hours battery life with GPS recording on
  • Altimeter; barometer; compass
  • Free topographic maps in Suunto Movescount app show trails and detailed elevation information
  • Breadcrumb of the track is always visible—no need to separately activate track-back feature
  • Location or point-of-interest can be stored anytime with 1-button press from any view
  • Flashlight / backlight automatically boosted to full power
  • Vibration alerts when it's too noisy to hear alarm sound
  • Tracks steps and calories
  • Mobile notifications

Imported.

ProductName: Suunto Spartan Trainer Wrist HR GPS Watch
ProductShortDescription: Part of being an athlete is pushing your limits. With GPS and wrist-based heart rate tracking, the Suunto Spartan Trainer Wrist HR helps you do just that—on the trails, the water or at the gym.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Wrist-based heart rate measurement offers convenience both in daily activity tracking and during sport activities, without the need for a pesky chest strap
  • Ready for all your sports: swimming, running, cycling, gym, hiking and more
  • GPS tracking with speed, pace and distance; GPS altitude measures ascent and descent values during workout
  • Battery life up to 10 hrs. in training mode; power save mode with good GPS accuracy extends battery life up to 30 hrs.
  • Compact size is optimal for multisport training, race day and daily wear
  • Find your way back with bread crumb view of traveled route
  • 24/7 tracking of your daily steps, calories and sleep; monitor your daily resting heart rate to help know if you are stressed or overtraining
  • Get incoming calls, text and calendar notifications to your watch
  • 50m water resistance makes this a great choice for indoor or outdoor use, including in the pool or open water 
  • Personalize your watch with customizable watch faces

Imported.

ProductName: PhD Run Ultra Light Micro Socks
ProductShortDescription: One of Smartwool's best fitting, most advanced run socks, PhD Run Ultra Light Micro Socks feature strategic cushioning and mesh zones for running comfort.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Cushioning in the ball and heel of the foot for ultimate shock absorption with minimal in-shoe volume 
• Two elastics for greater stretch and recovery 
• ReliaWool technology in high impact areas provides long-lasting protection 
• Mesh ventilation zones provide optimum temperature regulation and moisture management 
• Virtually seamless toe 
• 200 needle construction provides high-density cushioning while maintaining light weight

ProductShortDescription: Winner of Backpacker magazine's 2015 Editors' Choice Award for its built-in LED lighting, the 4-person Chimney Creek 4 mtnGLO Tent features ample living space, comfort and convenience
ContentFullProductDescription:
• mtnGLO™ Tent Lighting Technology features LED lights integrated into the tent body, so you can experience ambient light in your shelter with the click of a button 
  • LED light strands are durable and flexible enough to withstand repeated tent pitching and stuffing 
  • LEDs illuminate the interior of your tent with 90+ hrs. of hands-free light; sort gear, read, eat and play cards without blinding your friends with a headlamp 
  • 2 simple push-button controllers have 3 settings: on, off and 50% brightness; each controller requires 3 AAA batteries (sold separately) 
  • Lightweight aluminum pole system with Pressfit connectors; plastic clips and sleeves attach tent body to pole frame; color-coded webbing and buckles make setup easy 
  • 2 doors and 2 vestibules with stormflaps on vestibule zippers; Quick Stash on tent body doors make stowing unzipped doors easy 
  • Media pockets located above the sleeping area let you route earbud cords cleanly from phones or other devices; 12 interior mesh pockets keep small items organized 
  • Gear loft loops are compatible with the Big Agnes Entertainment Center and PowerCase mtnGLO gear lofts (sold separately) All seams are taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (no PVC or VOCs) 
  • Reflective guylines and webbing on tent corners 
  • Briefcase-style carry bag with shoulder straps and organizational pockets; 18 lightweight aluminum hook stakes

ProductShortDescription: You'll be comfy and cozy all night in the Marmot Ion sleeping bag. It fuses warmth and function in a body-mapped combo of synthetic insulation and 850-fill water-resistant down rated to 20°.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Body mapped 850-fill-power down with Down Defender resists moisture and wraps around body, head and feet; uses super-efficient Thermal R micro synthetic insulation on bottom 
  • Fold-down second zipper offers ventilation and easy access; antisnag slider reduces snagging 
  • Anatomic, wraparound footbox increases insulation and room for your feet, providing extra warmth and comfort 
  • Full-length, locking YKK 2-way zipper with zip-guard slider 
  • Smooth-curved baffle construction reduces down shifting 
  • Multi-baffle nautilus hood 
  • Stuff and storage sack included

ProductShortDescription: The small Ultralite 700 sleeping bag packs down and has a great warmth-to-weight ratio, letting you sleep in comfort when temps drop to freezing without adding weight or bulk to your pack.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Trim fit makes this bag ideal for use as a liner within a larger sleeping bag on subfreezing nights 
  • European Norm (EN) lower-limit rating of 21°F is suitable for 3-season use 
  • 800-fill-power goose down is certified to the Responsible Down Standard (RDS); nylon shell and lining meet bluesign® criteria 
  • Anatomic hood shapes to your head for a perfect fit when pulled tight; thick padded forehead baffle and flat drawcord help prevent pressure points 
  • Trim mummy shape accommodates users who turn with the bag while sleeping 
  • Angled, trapezoidal footbox is shaped to the natural position of your feet 
  • Oversized 3D draft tube is divided into multiple chambers to prevent down shift and unwanted cold spots; hidden stiffener helps prevent the zipper from snagging 
  • 55 in. zipper cuts weight, but is long enough to allow venting; it can also be zipped to another Exped Ultralite bag to couple 2 sleeping bags together 
  • Open side baffle between the top and bottom of the bag lets you shift down within the baffle to regulate insulation 
  • Soft fabric chin guards help keep your skin from coming in contact with the zipper 
  • Tactile drawcords are easy to operate in the dark with round lower and flat upper drawcords in the hood for simple cinching and adjustment 
  • Interior pocket makes it easy to access small items Includes an ultralight stuff sack
SEOMetaTagDescription:

ProductShortDescription: The women's Marmot Sunset 30 synthetic-fill sleeping bag features innovative construction to keep you warm from top to bottom, and it has nearly the same weight and packability as a down bag!
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Designed to fit a woman's body, bag offers increased room at hips, decreased room at shoulders and extra insulation in critical heat-loss areas 
  • Thermal R synthetic insulation's excellent loft keeps you warm with minimal weight; innovative wave construction, with overlapping shingles of insulation, prevents cold spots 
  • Body-mapping of insulation directs warmth to key areas and maximizes thermal efficiency 
  • With a European Norm (EN) comfort rating of 32°F, the Sunset 30 is a versatile bag for mild-weather 3-season adventures 
  • Non-bulky Thermal R maximizes warmth while reducing the adverse effects of perspiration, condensation and humidity inside the sleeping bag 
  • Anatomic 3D hood envelops your head in warmth; Face Muff allows hood to be cinched snug without digging into face 
  • Trapezoidal footbox allows insulation to loft fully around your feet for optimum warmth and comfort 
  • Full-length zipper with a snagless draft tube prevents fabric from snagging in the zipper coils 
  • No more midnight drawcord fumbling—smooth, flat upper cord and hard, round lower cord make hood and collar adjustments easy 
  • Inlcudes a lightweight stuff sack

ProductShortDescription: Lightweight, compact and filled with down, the large-size Exped Lite 500 mummy bag can be used for 3-season camping—or, if you add a layer of clothing, for frosty nights in the wild
ContentFullProductDescription:
• With a European Norm (EN) lower-limit rating of 28°F, this bag is suitable for 3-season use 800-fill-power goose down is certified to the 
  • Responsible Down Standard (RDS); horizontal and vertical baffles help prevent cold spots and down shift 
  • Three-dimensional draft collar keeps the heat where it belongs and drapes around your neck for cozy warmth 
  • Hood is anatomically shaped for a perfect fit when pulled tight; thick padded forehead baffle prevents pressure points 
  • Angled trapezoidal footbox is shaped to the position of your feet 
  • Oversize draft tube is divided into multiple chambers to prevent unwanted cold spots 
  • Hidden stiffener prevents the zipper from snagging 
  • Double tuck-stitch baffle seams improve abrasion resistance Round and flat upper hood drawcords are easy to adjust in the dark Interior pocket keeps small personal items within easy access 
  • Soft fabric chin guards prevent contact of the zipper to skin 
  • Waterproof stuff sack with rolltop closure and mosquito net storage sack included 2 loops on the footbox can be used to secure the sleeping bag when being aired 
  • Both the shell and liner fabrics are bluesign® certified

ContentFullProductDescription:
• With a European Norm (EN) lower-limit rating of 28°F, this bag is suitable for 3-season use 800-fill-power goose down is certified to the 
  • Responsible Down Standard (RDS); horizontal and vertical baffles help prevent cold spots and down shift 
  • Three-dimensional draft collar keeps the heat where it belongs and drapes around your neck for cozy warmth 
  • Hood is anatomically shaped for a perfect fit when pulled tight; thick padded forehead baffle prevents pressure points 
  • Angled trapezoidal footbox is shaped to the position of your feet 
  • Oversize draft tube is divided into multiple chambers to prevent unwanted cold spots 
  • Hidden stiffener prevents the zipper from snagging 
  • Double tuck-stitch baffle seams improve abrasion resistance Round and flat upper hood drawcords are easy to adjust in the dark Interior pocket keeps small personal items within easy access 
  • Soft fabric chin guards prevent contact of the zipper to skin 
  • Waterproof stuff sack with rolltop closure and mosquito net storage sack included 2 loops on the footbox can be used to secure the sleeping bag when being aired 
  • Both the shell and liner fabrics are bluesign® certified

ProductShortDescription: When leaving the tent seems harder than reaching the summit, the large DreamWalker Camp 650 sleeping bag turns into a warm 700-fill-power down coat so you can stay cozy all morning long.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Down insulation packs small and provides 3-season warmth 
  • 700-fill-power down certified by Responsible Down Standard (RDS) 
  • Soft fabric chin guards prevent zipper-to-skin contact 2 internal hand warmer pockets keep fingers toasty; arm exit zippers backed by draft tubes prevent heat loss when closed 
  • Thick forehead baffle and offset flat drawcord prevent pressure points 
  • Elastic control cord on the back of the hood ensures a snug, insulated fit, even when you're moving 
  • Comes with a waterproof stuff sack and mosquito net storage bag 5-year manufacturer warranty

Down insulation packs small and provides 3-season warmth 700-fill-power down certified by Responsible Down Standard (RDS) Soft fabric chin guards prevent zipper-to-skin contact

5-year manufacturer warranty

ProductShortDescription: The lofty 800-fill-power Sierra Designs Backcountry Bed 800 2-Season Sleeping Bag has an integrated comforter and zero zippers for a unique outdoor sleeping experience through spring and summer.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Climb into the bag via the large oval opening on top; the oversize comforter seals up the opening so you can sleep comfortably no matter your position: back, side or stomach 
  • With a European Norm (EN) lower-limit rating of 29°F, the Backcountry Bed 800 2 -Season sleeping bag is suitable for spring and summer backpacking 
  • On warmer nights, flip the comforter outside the sleeping bag and tuck it back for ventilation; insulated hand/arm pockets provide warmth when the comforter is outside the bag 
  • Down is considered the best insulation available but when wet, it quickly loses loft and the ability to keep you warm; 800-fill-power DriDown is treated to resist moisture 
  • Proprietary process treats each individual duck down plume with a molecular-level polymer so the down stays dry longer, lofts better and dries faster than untreated down 
  • DriDown insulation stays dry 10 times longer, retains 170% more loft when exposed to moisture and dries 33% faster than untreated down 
  • Ripstop polyester exterior endures frequent use in the outdoors; polyester taffeta lining is soft and comfortable next to skin 
  • Sleeping pad sleeve on the bottom of the bag secures your pad (pad sold separately) to create the experience of a fully integrated bed 
  • Sierra Designs Backcountry Bed 800 2-Season Sleeping Bag comes with a stuff sack and storage sack 
  • European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bags

ProductShortDescription: Use the coated nylon taffeta Big Agnes Copper Spur UL 1 Footprint underneath your Big Agnes Copper Spur UL 1 tent to protect its floor from wear and abrasion.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Sized slightly smaller than tent floor so that it prevents pooling of water under tent during wet weather 
  • Webbing stakeouts at corners provide easy attachment
SEOMetaTagDescription: Sized slightly smaller than tent floor so that it prevents pooling of water under tent during wet weather Webbing stakeouts at corners provide easy attachment

ProductShortDescription: The 2-person, 3-season Sierra Designs Flashlight 2 FL tent features a featherweight design that is lighter than the previous version, yet with all the same benefits for comfort and livability.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Individual doors for each occupant allow easy entry and exit for maximum livability, along with cross-ventilation for superior condensation management 
  • Large drop doors offer an open and airy feel 
  • Defined floor with only 6 stakeout points is easy to set up; eliminates the re-staking associated with other tarp tents and trekking-pole shelters
  • 8-in. awning provides dry entry and exit, delivers sun protection and allows for doors to remain open during a storm 
  • Hybrid double/single wall reduces weight and provides quick and dry setup, even in the rain 
  • Trekking-pole compatibility saves a valuable 6 oz. when you leave the 46-in. vertical poles behind, and makes this one of the largest, most livable tents in its weight class 
  • Gear closet creates storage where it should be—away from the door; it can be toggled closed or left open for additional venting, while staying dry in a rainstorm

ProductShortDescription: The 3-season Big Agnes Bitter Springs UL1 is an ultralight, trekking-pole supported backpacking shelter for one.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• One door and one oversized and roomy vestibule with storm flaps on the zipper 
  • All seams taped and waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (No PVC or VOCs) 
  • Trekking pole system, requires 2 trekking poles (not included) 
  • Requires one 38"/97cm trekking for the vestibule pole and one pole that collapses to 26"/66cm for the rear pole 
  • DAC Twist Clips and sleeves attach tent body to pole frame 
  • DAC pole feature the Jake's Foot simple connection mechanism evenly tensions the tent body and fly 
  • 15 Superlight aluminum J stakes 
  • Two interior mesh pockets

ProductShortDescription: For the camper with a lot of gear, the 3 season Wyoming Trail 2 solves the storage issue with a garage-like vestibule.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Two doors and two vestibules with one oversized main vestibule can store bikes, fishing rods and more; awning style vestibule may be staked out as a shade using trekking poles 
  • Storm flaps on vestibule zipper 
  • Reflective guylines and webbing on tent corners 
  • Color coded pole ends, webbing and buckles make set up easy; plastic clips attach tent body to pole frame 
  • All seams taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (No PVC or VOC's) 
  • Four interior mesh pockets 
  • Compatible with Big Agnes Entertainment Center loft and PowerCase/Loft (not included); fits Large Trapezoid gear loft (not included) 
  • Footprint available (sold separately)

ProductShortDescription: The second largest product in the Yellowstone series, the Kelty Yellowstone 6-person tent is built to fit six comfortably and spaciously. It's easy to fit a camping crowd without feeling crowded.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Large D-shaped door provides easy entry and exit; noiseless zipper pulls 
  • Awning fly with brow pole to help keep out rain 
  • Continuous pole-sleeve construction makes set up a breeze 
  • Fully seam taped construction, including the rainfly 
  • Color coded clip and fly attachment Internal storage pockets help keep inside of tent organized; ceiling loops allow attachment of gear loft (not included)

ProductShortDescription: With a trail weight of 2 lbs. 3 oz., the updated Big Agnes Copper Spur UL1 tent lets you enjoy a gossamer-light load and livable shelter space on your solo 3-season adventures.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Single vestibule and D-shaped door provide easy access and gear storage; vestibule door has a single stakeout and stormflaps over the zipper 
  • Crossover pole provides roominess up high 
  • Single hub/pole design with H-Clip connector and DAC Twist Clips makes setup quick and easy 
  • Light yet strong, DAC Featherlite® NSL poles are anodized without the use of harmful acids 
  • Mesh body and roof vent offers excellent ventilation to keep condensation from building up 
  • Rainfly and floor are made from ultralight silicone-treated, ripstop nylon with a waterproof polyurethane coating
  • Lightweight fabric has a high thread count and double twisted thread for strength and durability 
  • All seams taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape Interior mesh pocket keeps your gear organized and up off the tent floor; gear loft loops allow you to add your own gear loft (not included) 
  • Reflective guyline and reflective webbing on tent corners enhance nighttime visibility Includes stuff sacks and eight superlight aluminum J-stakes 
  • For a lightweight set up during nice weather, leave tent body behind; use footprint (sold separately) with poles, fly and stakes

ProductShortDescription: The Nook Shed doubles the covered storage area of your Nook tent (sold separately). It maximizes livability and comfort on extended backcountry trips.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Partial floor provides a clean, dry place to organize and store gear and a convenient threshold for shedding wet clothes before you climb inside your tent 
  • Doubles weatherproof storage by adding about 15 sq. ft. 
  • 1 large side door provides easy access into the Nook Gear Shed
  • Hooped design enhances roominess around shoulder area; interior peak height is 39 in. 
  • High-tenacity nylon provides superior performance; MSR® DuraShield coating is specifically formulated for waterproof performance and long life 
  • Taped seams prevent leakage through stitch holes in fabric

ProductShortDescription: With a balance of weight, space and protection, the Mountain Hardwear Hylo 3 tent features generous venting that offers the benefits of a double-walled tent in a light, single-wall hybrid design.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• High ceiling height, full-size door and large vestibule make this 3-season tent just right for 3 backpackers who want to shed grams without sacrificing comfort 
  • Industry-leading, 100% aluminum DAC Featherlight NSL poles 
  • Guaranteed watertight construction with fully taped fly and perimeter seam, along with welded corners and guy clip anchors 
  • Dry-entry vestibule with dual-slider mesh door 
  • Mesh pockets for interior storage 
  • Ultralight buckles and webbing reduce tent weight

ProductShortDescription: One of the most livable and functional tents in the ultralight weight class, the Sierra Designs Lightning FL is a freestanding, full-featured shelter offering maximum comfort at a minimum of weight.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Large single drop door saves weight, but is extra wide and large enough for 2 people to sit side by side 
  • Asymmetrical design tapers to the footbox to reduce weight; 42.5 in. peak height provides livable space and foot hoop creates a full-size footbox 
  • Hybrid double / single wall canopy reduces weight 
  • Integrated fly and tent body and hubbed pole pitch allow for speedy, dry setup 
  • 15-in. integrated awning replaces a traditional front vestibule, allowing maximum access to the full width of the door opening 
  • Side gear "closets" can be accessed from the outside or inside 
  • Covered foot vent creates an air tunnel between the foot-end and the door on the other end for ventilation and superior condensation management 
  • Freestanding tent can be pitched anywhere, no matter how impenetrable the surface

ProductShortDescription: Inspired by the Fly Creek UL line, the ultralight, 3-season Big Agnes Slater UL3+ tent offers the same light and fast design for three backpackers, plus extra floor space and less canopy mesh.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Extra space comes at little cost in terms of weight; lightweight, breathable ripstop nylon walls offer extra warmth, privacy and protection 
  • Light and strong DAC Featherlite® NSL poles, press-fit connectors and a lightweight hub use an anodization process with fewer chemicals than other processes 
  • DAC twist clips and color-coded pole ends, webbing and buckles make setting up the Big Agnes Slater UL3+ quick and easy 
  • Woven nylon mesh in the upper canopy provides ventilation; ripstop nylon helps keep sand and wind out of the tent when you head to the desert 
  • Polyurethane- and silicone-coated high-tenacity ripstop nylon fly and floor; waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape seals all seams 
  • Fly vent improves ventilation to reduce condensation; stormflap over vestibule zipper prevents water drips 
  • Reflective guyouts and reflective webbing on tent corners increase visibility at night 
  • 5 interior mesh pockets and gear loft loops (gear loft sold separately) accommodate storage 
  • For a lightweight setup during nice weather leave tent body behind; use the rainfly and footprint (sold separately) with the poles and stakes 
  • Comes with 15 superlight aluminum J stakes and stuff sacks

ProductShortDescription: Mountaineering tent offers unmatched double-wall strength and reliability. Its small footprint allows it to be pitched with minimal platform prep on steep slopes and ridges.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Large, hooped front vestibule offers generous space to store gear, thereby maximizing interior living space 
  • Large rear window keeps weight down while allowing cross ventilation 
  • Super strong advanced geometry and reinforced guyout points provide security in the worst conditions 
  • New color-coded pole clips make setting up in windy conditions easier than ever; they also allow ventilation between rainfly and canopy 
  • DuraShield™-coated fabrics are durable and waterproof; taped bathtub floor 4 internal pockets 
  • Multiple reflective guyout points increase the visibility of the tent in the dark

ProductShortDescription: Winner of Backpacker’s 2015 Editors' Choice Award for its built-in LED lighting, the 4-person, 3-season Gilpin Falls 4 mtnGLO tent also offers a clever power supply so you can charge your devices.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• mtnGLO™ Tent Lighting Technology features LED lights integrated into the tent body, so you can experience ambient light in your shelter with the click of a button 
  • LED light strands are durable and flexible enough to withstand repeated tent pitching and stuffing 
  • LEDs illuminate the interior of your tent with 90+ hrs. of hands-free light to sort gear, read, eat and play cards without blinding your friends with a headlamp 
  • 2 simple push-button controllers have 3 settings: on, off and 50% brightness; each controller requires 3 AAA batteries (sold separately) Included Joey 
  • T55 computerized power supply weighs just 7 oz.; it enables high-speed charging, charges multiple devices at once and senses the demand needed for each device 
  • Light and compact, the TSA and air-freight compliant Joey T55 helps protect your devices by sensing temperature and has no buttons to push or accidentally switch on or off 
  • 2 doors and 2 vestibules with stormflaps on vestibule zippers; Quick Stash makes it easy to stow unzipped doors 
  • 4 media pockets route earbud cords from phones or other devices; 2 interior mesh pockets hold tablets for easy movie viewing; 12 mesh organization pockets 
  • All seams taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (no PVC or VOCs) 
  • Color-coded webbing and buckles make setup easy; reflective guylines and webbing on tent corners and suggested anchor points 
  • Includes 18 lightweight aluminum hook stakes

  • 2 simple push-button controllers have 3 settings: on, off and 50% brightness; each controller requires 3 AAA batteries (sold separately) Included Joey 
  • T55 computerized power supply weighs just 7 oz.; it enables high-speed charging, charges multiple devices at once and senses the demand needed for each device 
  • Light and compact, the TSA and air-freight compliant Joey T55 helps protect your devices by sensing temperature and has no buttons to push or accidentally switch on or off 
  • 2 doors and 2 vestibules with stormflaps on vestibule zippers; Quick Stash makes it easy to stow unzipped doors 
  • 4 media pockets route earbud cords from phones or other devices; 2 interior mesh pockets hold tablets for easy movie viewing; 12 mesh organization pockets 
  • All seams taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (no PVC or VOCs) 
  • Color-coded webbing and buckles make setup easy; reflective guylines and webbing on tent corners and suggested anchor points 
  • Includes 18 lightweight aluminum hook stakes

ProductShortDescription: A go-to shelter when you want the perfect balance of weight savings, comfort and easy setup.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Volume-optimizing structure with strategic clip placement and extended head and foot zones creates extra interior volume for plenty of usable, livable space 
  • 1 D-shaped door and vestibule with jingle-free nylon zipper pulls 
  • Seam-taped, catenary-cut floor with twin-tip design increases durability and saves weight

  • Seam-taped, full-coverage fly with vents Interior pockets for small gear organization; lamp shade pocket securely holds your headlamp to provide ambient light 
  • Save weight and create a minimalist shelter by using just the rainfly, poles and footprint (sold separately)

ProductShortDescription: Featherweight build that gives solo backpackers more living space than comparable tents.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Using lightweight, fully siliconized nylon fabrics to repel water, the Elite fabric reduces weight, greatly increases strength, and offers better UV resistance 
  • Tensegrity gets wider toward its peak, offering plenty of room at the shoulders 
  • Innovative geometry removes the need for a guyline over the doorway 
  • Waterproof sidewalls zip open to provide maximum ventilation and visibility; head and foot walls are mesh 
  • Large drop door offers easy entry and exit, and creates an open and airy feel 
  • 12-in. awning provides dry entry and exit, delivers sun protection and allows for door / window to remain open during a storm
  • Pitches with trekking poles (sold separately); slotted webbing along the front of the tent lets you move the grommet pole-tip connector as needed to make pitching easier 
  • Gear closet creates storage space where it should be—away from the door; it can be toggled closed or left open for additional venting, while staying dry in a rainstorm

ProductShortDescription: The Big Agnes Fly Creek UL2 is an ultralight, 3-season tent for 2 that weighs in at a scant 2 lbs. 6 oz. and features integrated mtnGLO Tent Light Technology to light up the interior.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Patent-pending mtnGLO Tent Light Technology features durable LED lights that bathe the tent interior with ambient light for sorting gear, eating, reading and studying your map 
  • All the weatherproof and technical features of a semi-freestanding, 3-season tent with light materials make the Fly Creek an ideal shelter when you need to pack light 
  • A simple push button controller with three settings—on, off and 50% brightness—controls the mtnGLO lights; controller requires 3 AAA batteries (sold separately) 
  • CE certified LED light strand is integrated into tent seams; it's durable and flexible to withstand repeated tent pitching and stuffing 
  • DAC Featherlite NFL pole system features an angled SF hub for high-volume pole architecture and steeper walls, increasing usable interior space without increasing weight 
  • Ultralight plastic clips attach tent body to pole frame 
  • Dry-entry vestibule keeps the interior of your tent dry as you enter and exit; vertical door adds usable volume to the vestibule 
  • Single door and vestibule with storm flaps on the vestibule zipper 
  • Fly and floor have 1,200mm waterproof polyurethane coating; all seams are taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (No PVC or VOCs) 
  • 3 interior mesh pockets; gear loops are compatible with the Big Agnes Entertainment Center and PowerCase lofts (sold separately) 
  • Fast Fly setup available with optional footprint (sold separately) 
  • Reflective guylines and webbing on tent corners Comes with 11 superlight aluminum J stakes

ProductName: Garmin Fenix 5S Sapphire GPS Heart Rate Monitor Watch
ProductShortDescription: Finally, there's a GPS watch that won't feel bulky on your wrist. With the smallest diameter face (42mm) of the Fenix 5 lineup, the Garmin Fenix 5S is your premier training and adventure companion.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Besides the 3-axis compass, gyroscope and barometric altimeter, built-in GPS and GLONASS navigation sensors track accurately in more challenging environments than GPS alone
  • Round-trip Run and Ride routing options give you the ability to enter a distance you'd like to run or cycle and have the watch suggest appropriate courses
  • Easy-to-read guidance cues provide banners on the display that show upcoming turns
  • Around Me map mode provides nearby points of interest, waypoints and other locations in a simple graphical interface for navigating in unfamiliar environments
  • Wrist-based heart rate technology lets you monitor your heart rate without wearing a chest strap; watch uses heart rate to track calories burned and quantify fitness intensity
  • High-strength, scratch-resistant sapphire lens
  • Keep key data at your fingertips with a performance widget that shows your training status, training load and more
  • Data overlays on the map highlight key information so you don't have to switch screens while in an activity
  • Preloaded activity profiles for all of your sports and adventures, including swim profiles, skiing, paddle sports, golf and more
  • Sophisticated training features monitor your form and performance, including training status/effect, VO2 max, race predictor and recovery advice/timer
  • Advanced running dynamics allow you to go further with your running data; it taps into extended physiological metrics to help improve your form and overall performance
  • Pair with a heart rate chest strap (sold separately) to access additional metrics including vertical oscillation and ratio, ground contact time, balance and stress score
  • Use as an activity tracker for counting steps, calories and distance throughout your day
  • Sapphire edition offers Wi-Fi connectivity for smart notifications, auto-uploads to the Garmin Connect online community and personalization with free watch faces and apps
  • GroupTrack lets you keep tabs on your companions for adventures such as skiing; LiveTrack allows friends to follow your adventures in real time
  • Preloaded with more than 40,000 golf courses around the world
  • Rugged case is water-resistant to 100m; it features a stainless-steel bezel, buttons and rear case along with a high-strength, scratch-resistant sapphire lens

Imported.

  • Rose Gold/Cararra White includes white silicone band

ProductName: Garmin Fenix 5X Sapphire Multisport GPS Heart Rate Monitor Watch
ProductShortDescription: With full-color mapping on top of an already robust array of functions, the Garmin Fenix 5X Sapphire multisport GPS heart rate monitor watch stands out as a premier training and adventure companion.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Powered by precise GPS, the color TOPO U.S. mapping, routable run/bike maps and outdoor navigation features help ensure you make it to your destination—and make it back
  • Besides the 3-axis compass, gyroscope and barometric altimeter, built-in GPS and GLONASS navigation sensors track accurately in more challenging environments than GPS alone
  • Round-trip Run and Ride routing options give you the ability to enter a distance you'd like to run or cycle and have the watch suggest appropriate courses
  • Easy-to-read guidance cues provide banners on the display that show upcoming turns
  • Around Me map mode provides nearby points of interest, waypoints and other locations in a simple graphical interface for navigating in unfamiliar environments
  • Wrist-based heart rate technology lets you monitor your heart rate without wearing a chest strap; watch uses heart rate to track calories burned and quantify fitness intensity
  • Keep key data at your fingertips with a performance widget that shows your training status, training load and more
  • Data overlays on the map highlight key information so you don't have to switch screens while in an activity
  • Preloaded activity profiles cover many of your sports and adventures, including swimming, skiing, paddling, golf and more
  • Sophisticated training features monitor your form and performance, including training status/effect, VO2 max, race predictor and recovery advice/timer
  • Advanced running dynamics allow you to go further with your running data; it taps into extended physiological metrics to help improve your form and overall performance
  • Pair with a heart rate chest strap (sold separately) to access additional metrics including vertical oscillation and ratio, ground contact time, balance and stress score
  • Use as an activity tracker for counting steps, calories and distance throughout your day
  • Stay connected via Wi-Fi with smart notifications, auto-uploads to the Garmin Connect online community and personalization with free watch faces and apps from Connect IQ store
  • GroupTrack lets you keep tabs on your companions for adventures such as skiing; LiveTrack allows friends to follow your adventures in real time
  • Preloaded with more than 40,000 golf courses around the world
  • Rugged case is water-resistant to 100m; it features a stainless steel bezel, buttons and rear case along with a high-strength, scratch-resistant sapphire lens
  • Slate Gray/Metal watch features a metal band and includes a second silicone QuickFit band; Slate Gray/Black watch comes with a silicone QuickFit watch band 
  • QuickFit bands make it easy to mix and match styles to go with any activity—no tools required

Imported.

ProductShortDescription: Engineered with superior space and ventilation, the ultralightDragontail tent single-wall tent excels where others fail.

• Single-wall design shaves weight from your pack and reduces setup time; large vestibule improves livability 
  • Hooped pole configuration stands up under high winds and creates an impressively roomy interior 
  • Overhead vent with zippered closures runs the length of the tent, providing the ventilation that's critical to single-wall performance. 
  • Attention to detail shows in the taped seams, reinforced stress points, ultralight stake loops, reflective guy cords and user-friendly door toggles 
  • Includes stuff sacks, stakes and guyline

ProductShortDescription: Your go-to shelter when you want the perfect balance of weight savings, comfort and easy setup.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Volume-optimizing structure with strategic clip placement and extended head and foot zones creates extra interior volume for plenty of usable, livable space 
  • 2 D-shaped doors and vestibules with jingle-free nylon zipper pulls Seam-taped, catenary-cut floor with twin-tip design increases durability and saves weight 
  • Color-coded, easy-pitch clips and poles 
  • Seam-taped, full-coverage fly with vents Interior pockets for small gear organization; lampshade pocket securely holds your headlamp to provide ambient light 
  • Save weight and create a minimalist shelter by using just the rainfly, poles and footprint (sold separately)

ProductShortDescription: Perfect backpacking tent for solo adventurers who know that comfort and light weight aren't mutually exclusive.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Featherlight design offers all the same benefits as the previous version, but with even less weight
  •  Large drop door offers easy entry and exit for maximum livability, and creates cross-ventilation for superior condensation management 
  • Defined floor with only 6 stakeout points ensures easy setup and eliminates the re-staking associated with other tarp tents and trekking-pole shelters 
  • 8-in. awning provides dry entry and exit, delivers sun protection and allows for door / window to remain open during a storm 
  • Hybrid double / single wall reduces weight and provides quick, dry setup, even in the rain 
  • Trekking-pole compatibility saves a valuable 6 oz. when you leave the 46-in. vertical poles behind, making this one of the largest and most livable tents in its weight class 
  • Gear closet creates storage where it should be—away from the door; it can be toggled closed or left open for additional venting, while staying dry in a rainstorm

ProductShortDescription: features integrated LED lights that provide convenient ambient light in your backpacking shelter with the click of a button.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Patent-pending mtnGLO Tent Light Technology's durable LED lights illuminate the tent interior with light to sort gear, eat, read and study your map 
  • Simple push-button controller with 3 settings—on, off and 50% brightness—controls the mtnGLO lights; requires 3 AAA batteries (sold separately) 
  • CE certified LED light strand is integrated into tent seams; it's durable and flexible to withstand repeated tent pitching and stuffing 
  • Single door and vestibule with storm flaps on vestibule zipper 
  • DAC Featherlight NSL + NFL pole system with lightweight hub design; DAC H clip attaches tent body to crossover pole; ultralight plastic clips attach tent body to pole frame 
  • Steep wall construction and crossover pole increase interior space 2 media pockets located above sleeping area enable clean earbud cord routing from phones or other devices 
  • Fly and floor have waterproof polyurethane coating; all seams are taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (No PVC or VOCs) 
  • 3 interior mesh pockets; gear loops are compatible with the Big Agnes Entertainment Center and PowerCase lofts (sold separately) 
  • Fast Fly setup available with optional footprint (sold separately) 
  • Reflective guylines and webbing at tent corners 
  • 8 Superlight aluminum J stakes included

ProductShortDescription: The 3-season Big Agnes Big House 4 camping tent makes for a deluxe and comfortable experience. With a spacious design for 4 campers, easy setup and great ventilation, you'll have good reason to relax.
ContentFullProductDescription:
• Front door has dual closure options: mesh only on top for ventilation, or zip up the polyester layer for complete closure and protection from the elements 
  • Quick Stash on tent body door makes stowing unzipped door simple and easy; welcome mat at front door helps keep your Big House 4 tent free of debris 
  • Optional, zip-on, pole-supported front vestibule (sold separately) adds a sheltered area for relaxing or generous storage space 
  • Color-coded webbing and buckles create an intuitive setup; sleeves and plastic clips attach tent body to the pole frame quickly and easily 
  • Mesh door, walls and ceiling of tent offer excellent cross-ventilation; ripstop polyester fly and rugged polyester taffeta floor have a waterproof polyurethane coating 
  • Fly walls roll up to expose mesh walls for increased ventilation and visibility; vent in the fly minimizes condensation 
  • Lightweight aluminum pole system features press-fit connectors; securely fixed, pressed-in ferrules help ensure the poles remain strong and reliable 
  • Waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape seals all seams (no PVC or VOCs); waterproof door helps keeps tent dry 
  • Stay organized with 18 interior mesh pockets and gear loft loops (gear loft not included); reflective guylines and reflective webbing on tent corners aid nighttime visibility 
  • Includes briefcase-style carry bag with shoulder straps, organizational pockets and 14 lightweight aluminum hook stakes 
  • Optional, zip-on, pole-supported front vestibule adds generous storage area; footprint extends the life of your tent by protecting it from wear (both sold separately)
